pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":["注意：本镜像是 lineageOS 源代码的镜像，如果是希望下载 lineage 的 rom，请访问 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/lineage-rom/","children":"Lineage ROM 使用帮助"}]," 。"]}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"过程摘录","children":"过程摘录"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"下载 repo 工具："}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"mkdir ~/bin
PATH=~/bin:$PATH
curl https://storage.googleapis.com/git-repo-downloads/repo > ~/bin/repo
chmod a+x ~/bin/repo","language":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["或者使用",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/git-repo/","children":"git-repo 镜像"}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"建立工作目录："}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"mkdir WORKING_DIRECTORY
cd WORKING_DIRECTORY","language":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"初始化仓库："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"repo init -u {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/LineageOS/android.git -b lineage-21.0 --git-lfs","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"（如果已经有从 GitHub 同步的 lineageOS 源代码，可以从这里直接开始）"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["打开",["$r","code",null,{"children":".repo/manifests/default.xml"}],"，将"]}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"  <remote  name="github"
           fetch=".."
           review="review.lineageos.org" />
","language":"xml"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"改成"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"  <remote  name="github"
           fetch="https://github.com/" />

  <remote  name="lineage"
           fetch="{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/"
           review="review.lineageos.org" />","codeLanguage":"xml"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["替换 AOSP 请参考 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/AOSP/","children":"AOSP 帮助"}]," 中「LineageOS 中对于 AOSP 的替换」一节"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"将"}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"  <default revision="..."
           remote="github"","language":"xml"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"改成"}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"  <default revision="..."
           remote="lineage"","language":"xml"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"同步源码树（以后只需执行这条命令来同步）："}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"repo sync","language":"bash"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"异常处理","children":"异常处理"}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["部分仓库例如 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"Lineage_framework_base"}]," 同步的时候会出现 bundle 错误，这时候可以使用命令 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"repo sync --no-clone-bundle"}]," 进行同步。"]}],"
"]}]]}]

meta.title: LineageOS 源码仓库镜像使用帮助
